org.gridfour.compress

Class CodecStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gridfour.compress.CodecStats

  • public class CodecStats
extends Object
    A simple container for collecting statistics when analyzing compressed data.

    This statistics collector is suited to the standard compressors implemented by the Gridfour API. If desired, it may be used for other compressor implementations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CodecStats(PredictorModelType pcType)
      Construct a statistics object for the specified predictor model.

    • Method Summary

      Add metadata about the tile to the counts
      void clear()
      Clear any accumulated counts
      double getAverageLength()
      Get the average length of encoded tiles, in bytes.
      double getAverageMCodeLength()
      Gets the average length of the M32 code length across tiles.
      double getAverageObservedMCodes()
      Gets the average number of unique M32 codes observed in the compressed tile.
      double getAverageOverhead()
      Get the average overhead per tile.
      double getBitsPerSymbol()
      Get the number of bits per symbol in the pre-compression encoding.
      double getEntropy()
      Get the entropy for the data.
      String getLabel()
      Get a label for the predictor.
      long getTileCount()
      Get the number of tiles that have been counted.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CodecStats

        public CodecStats(PredictorModelType pcType)
        Construct a statistics object for the specified predictor model.
        Parameters:
        pcType - a valid predictor model type.

    • Method Detail

      • getLabel

        public String getLabel()
        Get a label for the predictor.
        Returns:
        a valid string

      • addToCounts

        public void addToCounts(int nBytesForTile,
                        int nSymbolsInTile,
                        int nBitsOverhead)
        Add metadata about the tile to the counts
        Parameters:
        nBytesForTile - the number of byts for the compressed version of the tile.
        nSymbolsInTile - the number of values in the tile, typically the number of cells in the grid.
        nBitsOverhead - Any compressor-specific overhead that an implementation wishes to track.

      • addCountsForM32

        public void addCountsForM32(int nM32,
                            byte[] m32)
        Add counts for the M32 symbols derived from the predictor for the tile.
        Parameters:
        nM32 - the total number of symbols in the encoded data
        m32 - the encoded data

      • getEntropy

        public double getEntropy()
        Get the entropy for the data. In information theory, the term "entropy" is essentially an indicator of the number of bits actually needed to encode data.
        Returns:
        a positive value

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear any accumulated counts

      • getBitsPerSymbol

        public double getBitsPerSymbol()
        Get the number of bits per symbol in the pre-compression encoding.
        Returns:
        zero or a positive number

      • getTileCount

        public long getTileCount()
        Get the number of tiles that have been counted.
        Returns:
        zero or a positive number

      • getAverageMCodeLength

        public double getAverageMCodeLength()
        Gets the average length of the M32 code length across tiles.
        Returns:
        a positive floating point value, potentially zero.

      • getAverageObservedMCodes

        public double getAverageObservedMCodes()
        Gets the average number of unique M32 codes observed in the compressed tile. The maximum number of unique M32 codes is 256 (which would occur if all possible M32 codes were used).
        Returns:
        a positive floating point value, potentially zero.

      • getAverageOverhead

        public double getAverageOverhead()
        Get the average overhead per tile. Not all compressors tabulate this value.
        Returns:
        zero or a positive value.

      • getAverageLength

        public double getAverageLength()
        Get the average length of encoded tiles, in bytes.
        Returns:
        zero or a positive number.
